rows.label: qev041401_MSG0001
rows.name: Elder Nan! What is wrong?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041401_MSG0002
rows.name:
*cough* Such hurting! Such aches! ...But do not fret.
No one care if poor old Nan go off to great caravan
in sky. *haaaack*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041401_MSG0003
rows.name:
Nan may as well go now... Sticking around longer just
mean *cough* *hack* *wheeze* more suffering...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041401_MSG0004
rows.name:
Meh-meh! Nan saying such things will only make
terrible sickness worse.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041401_JNK0010
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev041401_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Ngogo about Nan's condition.

rows.label: qev041401_JNK0020
rows.name: Worry

rows.label: qev041401_SEL0021
rows.name: Show concern for Nan's health.

rows.label: qev041401_MSG0005
rows.name:
Elder Nan has had bad cough for while now.
Many complaints of feeling generally ickyfied.
But lately, Nan REALLY starting to get cranky![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041401_MSG0006
rows.name:
Passing stranger friend is very kind. If Nopon were as
kind as friend, condition of Nan would not be so bad.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041401_MSG0007
rows.name:
To be truthy, Ngogo exhausted from looking after
mopey Elder Nan this whole time. If friend could
stay and talk to Nan, it would be big help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041401_MSG0008
rows.name:
Right now, Elder Nan is mostly big sad lump, but
usually Elder is wise and reliable boss of all Nopon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041401_MSG0009
rows.name:
At last grand assembly, Nan suggest all Nopon move
to New LA where human friends can protect them
from danger.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041401_MSG0010
rows.name:
But other leaders turn Nan into punching bag.
They say Nan is no longer Nopon if he willing to
give up nomadic ways.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041401_MSG0011
rows.name:
Shock left Nan bedridden. Now Nan grumble every day
and talk about disappearing. It make life as aide very
hard for Ngogo.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041401_MSG0012
rows.name:
Now surely friend understands searing, traumatic pain
of poor Ngogo![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041401_JNK0030
rows.name: Sympathize

rows.label: qev041401_SEL0031
rows.name: Offer Ngogo your heartfelt pity.

rows.label: qev041401_JNK0040
rows.name: Criticize

rows.label: qev041401_SEL0041
rows.name: Say that you feel worse for Elder Nan.

rows.label: qev041401_MSG0013
rows.name:
Friend is very understanding. Perhaps Ngogo join
friend for stiff drink after work sometime.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041401_MSG0014
rows.name:
If Nan in such rush to disappear, then go! Ngogo
much more tragic for having to put up with self-pity.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041401_MSG0015
rows.name:
Oh! Idea! Meh-meh! Friend can help Ngogo with plan
to cheer Nan called...Operation Fireworkstravaganza![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041401_MSG0016
rows.name:
If Elder Nan stay depressed much longer,
Ngogo going to totally lose it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041401_MSG0017
rows.name:
All friend need to do is travel to caravans and get
signed contracts from Nopon. Job is so easy,
even stupid nopopotamus could do it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041401_MSG0018
rows.name:
Decided! If we pull off this surprise,
Nan is sure to perk up![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041401_MSG0019
rows.name:
*cough* *hack* *wheeze*
Ngogo... Nan hear everything you say.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041401_MSG0020
rows.name:
Nan not moping, and... *cough*
...And Nan certainly not need cheering up![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041401_MSG0021
rows.name:
Hmm. Secret plan of Ngogo little less secret now.
Oh well![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041401_MSG0022
rows.name:
In any case, go tell Nopon in each caravan to send up
fireworks for brave, sick Nan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041401_MSG0023
rows.name:
Meh! Oh, and remember that spoken promise from
Nopon is worthless, so be sure to get all in writing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041401_MSG0024
rows.name:
Meh-meh! Oh, and if possible, bring caravan leader
from Cauldros back with you. Name is Popote.
Popote is grandsonpon of Nan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041401_MSG0025
rows.name: If Nan croak, family of Nan should be around to see.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041401_MSG0026
rows.name: Stop killing off Nan! *cough* *hack*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041401_MSG0027
rows.name:
Besides, family all leave Nan. Abandon Nan.
They will never come back. *cough*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041401_JNK0050
rows.name: Cheer

rows.label: qev041401_SEL0051
rows.name:
Try to boost Nan's spirits by expressing
confidence in his family's return.

rows.label: qev041401_JNK0060
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev041401_SEL0061
rows.name:
Say that may very well be true,
then go deathly silent.

rows.label: qev041401_MSG0028
rows.name:
*cough* Nan done trusting anyone. Friend need not
do anything. Nan just going to quietly disappear into
deep, dark night...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041401_MSG0029
rows.name:
*cough* Friend understands. Whole family hate Nan.
Now Nan just want to disappear...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041401_MSG0030
rows.name:
Ha ha! Please ignore grumbling of mopey old Nopon.
Now, good luck on quest![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041401_MSG0047
rows.name:
Nopon caravans are set up in Noctilum, Oblivia,
Sylvalum, and Cauldros.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041401_MSG0048
rows.name:
Friend should head out and start getting contracts
while Ngogo artfully pretend to care about nonstop
grumbling from Elder Nan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041401_MSG0049
rows.name:
Oh, and no forgetting to bring back Popote from
caravan in Cauldros.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041401_MSG0050
rows.name:
Oh-ho-hoooo! Thank you for bringing Popote, friend!
Just look at them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041401_MSG0051
rows.name:
Meh-meh! Grampypon hurry and fix Popote dinner
already! Also, watching Grampypon sleep is boring.
Be more fun![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041401_MSG0052
rows.name:
*cough* *cough* Of all the nerve...
Just what did Popote come here for anyway?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041401_MSG0053
rows.name:
See? Elder Nan already more full of energy now that
grandsonpon is visiting.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041401_MSG0054
rows.name:
And once fireworks go up, Elder Nan can die with
no regret. Er, friend DID get contracts, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041401_MSG0055
rows.name: ...Meh! Perfect! All look good and legally binding![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041401_MSG0056
rows.name:
Nopon terrible at keeping promises, but contracts
absolute. This take care of everything![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041401_MSG0057
rows.name:
Ngogo take Elder Nan to spot with good view.
Friend should meet us in front of BLADE Tower.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041401_MSG0059
rows.name:
Thanks for bringing Pisa, friend. Elder still grumbly,
but condition seem much better.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041401_MSG0060
rows.name:
Oh-ho-hoooo! Pisa has bit of lint stuck to body!
Don't worry, Nan will get it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041401_MSG0061
rows.name:
MEH-MEH-MEH! Watch your paws, Elder Nan!
Stop that![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041401_MSG0062
rows.name:
*cough* *horf* Oh, it hurt! Nan so terribly ill!
Have pity on sick old Nopon![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041401_MSG0063
rows.name:
...Seems Elder Nan is still well enough to act like
usual terrible self.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041401_MSG0064
rows.name:
And once fireworks go up, Elder Nan can die with
no regret. Er, friend DID get contracts, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041401_MSG0065
rows.name: ...Meh! Perfect! All look good and legally binding![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041401_MSG0066
rows.name:
Nopon terrible at keeping promises, but contracts are
absolute. This take care of everything![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041401_MSG0067
rows.name:
Ngogo take Elder Nan to spot with good view.
Friend should meet us in front of BLADE Tower.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041401_MSG0070
rows.name:
Popote must have been blown away to somewhere in
Cauldros. It may be tough searching, but friend must
have look for sake of poor sick Nan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041401_MSG0071
rows.name: Well? Is Popote all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041401_MSG0072
rows.name:
Whew! Ngogo is glad Popote made it back to
caravan. And Elder Nan seem much better after
seeing Pisa.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041401_MSG0073
rows.name:
Road had many bumps and potholes, but everything
work out in the end. Here is agreed payment for friend.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041401_MSG0074
rows.name:
Oh, and Ngogo just heard that Pisa is starting career
in New LA as something called "fashion model."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041401_MSG0075
rows.name:
Pisa really sound excited. Ngogo also eager to stop
babysitting Elder Nan and begin new life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041401_JNK0090
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev041401_SEL0091
rows.name:
Say the sooner Ngogo can start
on a new path, the better.

rows.label: qev041401_JNK0100
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev041401_SEL0101
rows.name:
Say that Ngogo should focus on doing his
current job to the best of his abilities.

rows.label: qev041401_MSG0076
rows.name:
Friend is so serious! Well, Elder Nan is bound to
kick bucket soon enough. Ngogo will stick with
current job until then.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041401_MSG0077
rows.name:
Friend is such proactive type, if not little bit cold...
Well, Elder Nan is bound to kick bucket soon
enough. Ngogo will stick with current job until then.[ST:wait ]
